post:
We have deployed a few more nodes at our Florida location, so I thought I'd share this with you:

2 Intel Xeon cores

4 GB DDR3 ECC RAM

30 GB RAID-10 SSD space

2 TB Bandwidth on GigE uplink

Platform: OpenVZ

Control panel: KiwiVM

[https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=24](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=24)

Enjoy!
